issue.title: [Developer] Do not suggest setting Fix Version for point releases in dev/merge_arrow_pr.py
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5985](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5985). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I think the merge tool should only suggest major releases by default. This will help avoid having resolved issues spuriously set to a patch release Fix Version
